title: Lake Urmia, Iran
description: Lake Urmia is a saline lake in northwestern Iran. Once the largest lake in the Middle East, the lake has shrunk to 10% of its original size due to damming of its inflow rivers and pumping of groundwater.
theme:
FALSE – COLOR. Satellites show what human
eyes can't see
